info.title: HiveCPQ Product Configurator
info.description: HiveCPQ is a comprehensive Configure Price Quote (CPQ) solution that empowers sales teams to generate accurate quotes for complex products. Streamline your sales process by seamlessly integrating HiveCPQ to automate workflows, sync data, and optimize your operations using our connector. Maximize efficiency and deliver exceptional sales experiences with HiveCPQ's powerful connector.

get.description: Get all manufacturers to which you are connected.
Search companies linked to a manufacturer.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter on the name of the companies.

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: Filter on the archival status of the companies.

post.description: Add a new company to a manufacturer.

get.description: Get a specific company linked to a manufacturer.

put.description: Update a specific company of a manufacturer.

post.description: Archive a company together with all of its contacts.
Unarchive a company without unarchiving its contacts.

get.summary: Search default addresses of a company
get.description: Search the default invoice and delivery addresses of a company.

post.description: Add a new default address to a company.

get.summary: Get a default address of a company
get.description: Get a specific default address of a company.

put.summary: Update a default address of a company
put.description: Update a specific default address of a company.

delete.summary: Delete a default address of a company
delete.description: Delete a specific default address of a company.

get.description: Search contacts linked to a manufacturer or its companies.

post.description: Add a new contact to a company of a manufacturer or its companies.

get.description: Get a specific contact of a manufacturer or its companies.

put.description: Update a specific contact of a manufacturer or its companies.

post.description: Archive a specific contact and remove its invites.

get.description: Search accounts in the address book of a distributor.

post.description: Add an account to the address book of a distributor.

put.description: Update a specific account in the address book of a distributor.

delete.description: Delete a specific account from the address book of a distributor. An account can only be removed if it is not used in any projects and has no contacts.

get.description: Search contacts in the address book of a distributor.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Filter on the account to which the contacts are connected.

post.description: Add a new contact to the address book of a distributor.

put.description: Update a specific contact in the address book of a distributor.

delete.description: Delete a specific contact from the address book of a distributor.

get.description: Search invites of a manufacturer.

parameters.name: integratedContactSystemId
parameters.description: Filter on the integrated system ID of the contact to which the invite is sent. This must be used together with the integrated system name filter.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: Filter on the contact to which the invite is sent.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter on the status of the invites.

post.description: Add an invite for a contact to join a company.
Send an invitation email using the HiveCPQ email system.

parameters.name: inviteId
parameters.description: ID of the invite you want to access.

get.description: Search container versions of a manufacturer.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter on the status of the container versions.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter on the type of the container versions.

get.description: Search components in master data.

parameters.name: priceCatalogId
parameters.description: Filter on the price catalog used in the price(s) of the components.

parameters.name: articleCode
parameters.description: Filter on the article code of the components.

parameters.name: eanCode
parameters.description: Filter on the EAN code of the components.

parameters.name: gtinCode
parameters.description: Filter on the GTIN code of the components.

post.description: Add a component to master data.

get.description: Get a specific component in master data.

put.description: Update a specific component in master data.

delete.description: Delete a component from master data.

post.description: Delete multiple components in master data.

get.description: Search prices of a component in master data.

post.description: Add a new price to a component in master data.

delete.description: Delete a price from a component in master data.

parameters.name: componentPriceId
parameters.description: The component price you want to access.

get.description: Search attachments of a component in master data.

parameters.name: isImage
parameters.description: Filter on whether the file is an image.

post.description: Add a new attachment to a component in master data.

parameters.name: isImage
parameters.description: Indicate whether the uploaded file is an image or an info file.

delete.description: Delete an attachment from a component in master data.

get.description: Search property values of a component in master data.

post.description: Set a single property value on a component in master data.
Set multiple property values on a component in master data. Existing values are overwritten or deleted.
Links one or more features to a component in master data. Existing links will be overwritten or deleted.

put.summary: Link a feature to a component
put.description: Links one feature to a component in master data.

delete.summary: Unlink a feature from a component
delete.description: Unlinks a feature from a specific component in master data.

get.description: Search properties in master data.

post.description: Add a new property to master data.

put.description: Update a specific property in master data.

delete.description: Delete a specific property from master data.

get.description: Search feature groups in master data.

post.description: Add a new feature group to master data.
Reorder the feature groups to change how they are displayed in the product store. All existing groups must be part of the request.

get.description: Get a specific feature group in master data.

put.description: Update a specific feature group in master data.

delete.description: Delete a specific feature group from master data.

get.description: Search features in a specific feature group in master data.

post.summary: Add a feature to a feature group
post.description: Add a new feature to a specific feature group in master data.

post.summary: Reorder features in a feature group
post.description: Reorder the features in a specific feature group to change how they are displayed in the product store. All existing features in the group must be part of the request.

get.summary: Get a feature from a feature group
get.description: Get a feature in a specific feature group in master data.

put.description: Update a feature in a specific feature group in master data.

delete.description: Delete a feature from a specific feature group in master data.

post.summary: Change the feature group of a feature
post.description: Change the feature group of a specific feature in master data.

get.description: Search units in master data.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Filter on the code of the units.

post.description: Add a new unit to master data.

get.description: Get a specific unit from master data.

put.description: Update a specific unit in master data.

delete.description: Delete a specific unit from master data.

get.description: Search custom object types of a manufacturer.
Search custom objects of a specific type.

post.description: Add a new custom object of a specific type. This type will be created if it does not exist.

keyValues.description: Key value pairs to store inside of the new custom object.

get.description: Get a custom object of a specific type.

put.description: Update a specific custom object of a specific type.

delete.description: Delete a custom object of a specific type.

post.description: Configurators may use caching when handling custom objects. Calling this endpoint will reset those caches.

get.description: Search projects of a manufacturer.

post.description: Add a new project for a company.

get.description: Get a specific project of a manufacturer.

put.description: Update a specific project of a manufacturer.

post.description: Add one or more products to a project of a manufacturer.

schema.description: List of IDs of all created project segment items.

items.description: ID of a project segment item.

post.description: Copies all data of a project to a new project.

post.summary: Generate a document for a project
post.description: Generate a PDF document for a specific project. The template ID is optional only if the document type is QUOTE and a default template has been configured.

post.summary: Add a configuration to a project
post.description: Add a new V2 configuration to a project.

post.summary: Refresh the prices in running projects
post.description: Refresh prices of all projects which have not yet reached step 2 in the order process with master data.

get.description: Search project segments of a manufacturer.

parameters.name: companyBId
parameters.description: Filter on the distributor company the project segments are created for.

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: Filter on the step in the order flow of the project segments.

get.description: Get a specific project segment of a manufacturer.

put.description: Update a specific project segment of a manufacturer.

post.description: Archive a specific project segment of a manufacturer.
Unarchive a specifc project segment of a manufacturer.

post.summary: Move a project segment to step 1
post.description: Move a specific project segment to step 1. This starts the order process.

post.summary: Move a project segment to step 2
post.description: Move a specific project segment to step 2. This creates an order for the project segment.

post.summary: Move a project segment to step 3
post.description: Move a specific project segment to step 3.

post.summary: Move a project segment to step 4
post.description: Move a specific project segment to step 4.

post.summary: Cancel order process of a project segment
post.description: Cancel the order process and move a project segment back to step 2.

post.summary: Change the settings of a project segment
post.description: Change the settings of a project segment. Settings are only available if a segment configurator is configured.

post.summary: Add a configuration to a segment
post.description: Add a V1 configuration to a specific project segment.

get.description: Search project segment items of a specific manufacturer.

parameters.name: projectSegmentId
parameters.description: Filter on the project segment of the items.

get.description: Get a specific project segment item of a manufacturer.

put.description: Update a specific project segment item of a manufacturer.

delete.description: Delete a specific project segment item from a project.

post.summary: Copy project segment item to another project
post.description: Copies a project segment item to another project. If the item has a configuration attached it will automatically be upgraded to the newest version.
Create a standalone configuration by launching a configuration check for a V2 configurator

get.description: Get a specific configuration of a manufacturer.

parameters.name: uniqueLabel
parameters.description: Filter on the unique label of the configuration nodes.

parameters.name: includeOptionalNodes
parameters.description: Filter or include optional configuration nodes.

post.description: Update the values of the nodes in a configuration.

get.description: Get the file attached to a file node in the configuration.

parameters.name: uniqueLabel
parameters.description: The unique label of the file node.

get.description: Search integrated system links of a manufacturer. An Integrated System link stores a link between a Hive entity and an external system entity.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Filter on the resource type of the integrated system links.

post.description: Add a new integrated system link for a resource.

put.description: Update a specific integrated system link of a manufacturer.

delete.description: Delete a specific integrated system link.

delete.description: Delete a specific webhook of a manufacturer.

delete.summary: Delete the header of a webhook
delete.description: Delete the header of a specific webhook.

get.description: Search event subscriptions to which you are subscribed.

parameters.description: Filter on the name of the price catalogs.

put.description: Update a specific complaint of a manufacturer.

delete.description: Delete a specific complaint of a manufacturer.

get.description: Search comments of a specific complaint.

Replace all comments of a specific complaint.

get.description: Search attachments of a specific complaint.

get.description: Get an attachment of a specific complaint.

get.description: Get a specific user account connected to the given manufacturer.

parameters.name: userAccountId
parameters.description: ID of the user account you want to access.

get.description: Search output document templates of a manufacturer.
Search roles the manufacturer has defined for its own contacts and those of its distributors.

parameters.name: defaultRoleForManufacturerCompany
parameters.description: Filter the roles to those used as default for users of your manufacturer company.

parameters.name: defaultRoleForDistributorCompanies
parameters.description: Filter the roles to those used as default for users of your distributor companies.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter on the name of the roles.

get.description: Search permissions of a manufacturer.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Filter on the code of the permissions.

parameters.name: roleId
parameters.description: Filter on the role to which the permissions are connected.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Filter on the type of the events.

parameters.name: eventGroup
parameters.description: Filter on the group of the event types.

parameters.name: dateOccurredAfter
parameters.description: Filter events which happened after the specified date and time.

parameters.name: targetIntegrationName
parameters.description: Filter events related to the external system integrating with Hive.

get.description: Get information about the user who is currently using a plugin from within HiveCPQ.

parameters.name: pluginTokenId
parameters.description: The plugin token generated by a Hive Plugin from which you want to retrieve user data.

get.description: Search delivery conditions of a manufacturer.
Search payment conditions of a manufacturer.
Search tax conditions of a manufacturer.

linkName.description: Translated name of the linked resource.

integratedSystemId.description: ID of the resource as represented in the external system.

externalLink.description: An external link allowing integrators to link a resource in an external system to a resource in HiveCPQ.

externalLinks.description: All integrated system links attached to this resource.

roleLinks.description: All roles linked to this resource.

name.description: The unique name of the catalog.

uniqueLabel.description: The unique identifier of the node.

value.description: The textual representation of the node value.

countryIso.description: The country code in ISO 3166-2 format.

stateIso.description: The area code in ISO 3166-2 format.

customObjectKeyValuePair.description: This represents a key value pair used to store or pass data with custom objects.

key.description: A unique key which will be used to identify a value inside of a single custom object.

value.description: A textual representation of the value to be saved for the key.

enumConfigurationNodeDatatype.description: Data type of the node value.

enumProjectSegmentOrderStatus.description: Status of the order in the order flow.

enumProjectSegmentItemType.description: Type of the project segment item.

enumCustomObjectValueDataType.description: The data types which can be used for custom object values.

enumSystemLinkResourceType.description: The types of resources for which integrated system links can be created.

enumWebhookEventSubscription.description: The events to which a webhook can subscribe.

enumEventGroup.description: The event group of an event.

enumWebhookTriggerLocation.description: The location of the webhook trigger in the UI of HiveCPQ.

enumWebhookTriggerType.description: The type of the webhook trigger.

languageCode.description: The language code in ISO 639-1 format.

vatCondition.description: The VAT condition code. Available codes are defined inside your HiveCPQ environment.

deliveryCondition.description: The delivery condition code. Available codes are defined inside your HiveCPQ environment.

paymentCondition.description: The payment condition code. Available codes are defined inside your HiveCPQ environment.

shippingDateRequested.description: The requested date in ISO-8601 format.

requestBasicIntegratedSystemLink.description: A system link which will be added directly after creation of the resource that is being added

websiteUrl.description: URL to the website of the company.

distributorAccountInfo.description: General info about the distributor account.

mobile.description: Mobile phone number of the contact

preferredLanguageIso.description: Default language of the contact in ISO 639-1 format.

vatCondition.description: The default VAT condition code for this contact. Available codes are defined inside your HiveCPQ environment.

websiteUrl.description: URL to the website of the company.

preferredLanguage.description: The default language for the company in ISO 639-1 format.

externalSystemId1.description: An ID used to identify the company in an external system. It is usually recommended to use a system link instead.

externalSystemId2.description: An ID used to identify the company in an external system. It is usually recommended to use a system link instead.

requestCompanyInfo.description: The general info about a company.

shippingManagerContactId.description: ID of a contact who functions as shipping support manager.

requestCompanyAdvanced.description: The advanced info about a company.

vatConditionCode.description: The default VAT condition code to use in projects of this company. Available codes are defined inside your HiveCPQ environment.

deliveryConditionCode.description: The default delivery condition code to use in projects of this company. Available codes are defined inside your HiveCPQ environment.

paymentConditionCode.description: The default payment condition code to use in projects of this company. Available codes are defined inside your HiveCPQ environment.

baseDiscount.description: The default discount to use for configurations in projects of this company.

orderCurrency.description: Default order currency of the company.

fee.description: The fee applied if a project for this company does not reach the fee threshold.

threshold.description: The minimum price below which a fee will be applied.

administrationFee.description: Administration fee applied to projects of this company.

requestCompanySalesConditions.description: The conditions and defaults applied to projects of this company.

enabled.description: Allow this company to access the product store

storeDiscountPercentage.description: The discount percentage applied to product store items in a project of this company.

requestCompanyProductStore.description: Product store settings of this company.

defaultVatConditionCode.description: The default VAT condition code to use in projects for this company. Available codes are defined inside your HiveCPQ environment.

defaultPaymentConditionCode.description: The default payment condition code to use in projects for this company. Available codes are defined inside your HiveCPQ environment.

salesPricingStrategy.description: The default pricing strategy to use in projects for this company.

requestCompanyDefaultProjectSettings.description: The default project settings of the company.

code.description: The unique code of the unit.
The property code for which the new value should be set.

value.description: The new value of the property if it is not of an array type.

arrayValues.description: The new collection of values of the property if it is an array type.

propertyValues.description: The collection of property values which need to be set.

priceCatalogId.description: Price catalog ID to which this price belongs.

unitId.description: ID of the unit to be used with the price.

productGroup.description: The group to which your component belongs.
The group to which your component belongs.

items.description: ID of a component which should not be deleted.

idsNotIn.description: A list of component IDs which should not be deleted. It cannot be used together with idsIn.

items.description: ID of a component which should be deleted.

idsIn.description: A list of component IDs which should be deleted. It cannot be used together with idsNotIn.

code.description: Unique code for the feature group.

featureGroupIds.description: A collection of all feature group IDs in the desired sequence.

name.description: Unique name of the price catalog.

items.description: The input values for the configurator.

parameters.description: Information about the component if it has been configured as a configurable product.

status.description: An external status of the order.

quantity.description: The quantity of this item used to calculate the total price.

user.description: The user who experienced the error.

queryPageSize.description: Control the size of the returned page.

queryUpdatedSince.description: Retrieve all results which were last updated no sooner than the specified time.

queryLanguage.name: language
queryLanguage.description: Specify the ISO 639-1 language code in which translated fields should be returned. If not provided, the language of the user is used.
